tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ab_testing_data (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_group TEXT,
  conversion_status BOOLEAN,
  conversion_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ab_test_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  conversion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ab_test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  group_name VARCHAR(50),
  conversion_rate DECIMAL,
  sample_size INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ab_test_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  conversion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE user_data (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  campaign_id INT,
  test_date DATE,
  variation VARCHAR(50),
  conversion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_data (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    source_campaign_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_data (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name TEXT,
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP,
    experiment_group VARCHAR(1),
    conversion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    conversion_status BOOLEAN,
    conversion_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Campaign_Results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    conversion_status BOOLEAN,
    conversion_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
